Package au.csiro.pathling.search

Class SearchProvider

java.lang.Object
au.csiro.pathling.search.SearchProvider
All Implemented Interfaces:
IResourceProvider
@Component @Scope("prototype") @Profile("server") public class SearchProvider extends Object implements IResourceProvider
HAPI resource provider that can be instantiated using any resource type to add the FHIRPath search functionality.
Author:
John Grimes

  • Constructor Details

    • SearchProvider

      public SearchProvider(@Nonnull ServerConfiguration configuration, @Nonnull FhirContext fhirContext, @Nonnull SparkSession sparkSession, @Nonnull au.csiro.pathling.io.Database database, @Nonnull Optional<TerminologyServiceFactory> terminologyServiceFactory, @Nonnull au.csiro.pathling.encoders.FhirEncoders fhirEncoders, @Nonnull Class<? extends IBaseResource> resourceClass)
      Parameters:
      configuration - A ServerConfiguration object to control the behaviour of the executor
      fhirContext - A FhirContext for doing FHIR stuff
      sparkSession - A SparkSession for resolving Spark queries
      database - A Database for retrieving resources
      terminologyServiceFactory - A TerminologyServiceFactory for resolving terminology queries within parallel processing
      fhirEncoders - A FhirEncoders object for converting data back into HAPI FHIR objects
      resourceClass - A Class that extends IBaseResource that represents the type of resource to be searched

  • Method Details

    • getResourceType

      @Nonnull public Class<? extends IBaseResource> getResourceType()
      Specified by:
      getResourceType in interface IResourceProvider

    • search

      @OperationAccess("search") public IBundleProvider search()
      Handles all search requests for the resource of the nominated type with no filters.
      Returns:
      A SearchExecutor which will generate the Bundle of results

    • search

      @OperationAccess("search") public IBundleProvider search(@Nullable StringAndListParam filters)
      Handles all search requests for the resource of the nominated type that contain filters.
      Parameters:
      filters - The AND/OR search parameters passed using the "filter" key
      Returns:
      A SearchExecutor which will generate the Bundle of results
